agriculture_and_farming_schemes.scheme_name: Primary Cooperative Agriculture and Rural Development Bank: For Minor Irrigation
agriculture_and_farming_schemes.ministry: Government of Tamil Nadu
agriculture_and_farming_schemes.department: Co-operation, Food and Consumer Protection Department
objectives: Provide financial assistance for minor irrigation projects
Enhance water availability and crop productivity
eligibility_criteria: Farmer needing support for minor irrigation

steps: Collect and fill application form from Primary Cooperative Agriculture and Rural Development Bank
Submit to Secretary or Special Officer of the Bank

documents_required: Proof of land ownership or lease

agriculture_and_farming_schemes.scheme_name: Primary Cooperative Agriculture and Rural Development Bank: For Plantation (Tea)
agriculture_and_farming_schemes.ministry: Government of Tamil Nadu
agriculture_and_farming_schemes.department: Co-operation, Food and Consumer Protection Department
objectives: Provide financial assistance for tea plantations
eligibility_criteria: Willing to use loan specifically for tea plantation

steps: Collect and fill application form from Primary Cooperative Agriculture and Rural Development Bank
Submit to Secretary or Special Officer of the Bank

documents_required: Proof of land ownership or lease

agriculture_and_farming_schemes.ministry: Government of Tamil Nadu
agriculture_and_farming_schemes.department: Agriculture-Farmers Welfare Department
objectives: Provide soil test results and recommendations for balanced fertilizer use

benefits.soil_health_card: Issued after ₹5 fee per test for macro/micro nutrients

eligibility_criteria: Farmer who submitted soil samples and paid the fee

steps: Fill and submit form with documents to concerned authority

documents_required: Proof of soil sample submission and payment

agriculture_and_farming_schemes.scheme_name: Distribution of Certified Seeds of Maize
agriculture_and_farming_schemes.ministry: Government of Tamil Nadu
agriculture_and_farming_schemes.department: Agriculture-Farmers Welfare Department
objectives: Promote maize cultivation by subsidizing seed cost
Support small, marginal, SC/ST, and women farmers
eligibility_criteria: Farmer growing maize in specified districts
24% benefit flow to SC/ST, 20% to women/women groups

steps: Submit to Assistant Agricultural Officer / Agricultural Officer / Joint Director

documents_required: Proof of land ownership or tenancy

agriculture_and_farming_schemes.scheme_name: Pipes Carrying Water From Source To Field
agriculture_and_farming_schemes.ministry: Government of Tamil Nadu
agriculture_and_farming_schemes.department: Agriculture-Farmers Welfare Department
objectives: Support farmers in improving irrigation facilities
Subsidize the cost of pipes used for water transportation to fields

benefits.subsidy: 50% of the pipe cost or ₹15,000 (whichever is lower) for up to 800 meters
benefits.pipe_types: All types (PVC, HDPE, etc.) and sizes as per farmer requirement

steps: Collect the application form from the nearest Agricultural Office
Fill out the application form and attach required documents
Submit to the Assistant Agricultural Officer (village), Agricultural Officer/Deputy AO (block), or Joint Director of Agriculture (district)

documents_required: Proof of identity (Aadhaar card, Voter ID)
Land ownership documents or lease agreement
Women farmer group registration documents (if applicable)

agriculture_and_farming_schemes.scheme_name: Primary Cooperative Agriculture and Rural Development Bank: For Tractor Purchase
agriculture_and_farming_schemes.ministry: Government of Tamil Nadu
agriculture_and_farming_schemes.department: Co-operation, Food and Consumer Protection Department
objectives: Provide financial support for purchasing tractors

benefits.loan_amount: Up to 90% of the tractor's cost

eligibility_criteria: Intention to use the loan specifically for tractor purchase

steps: Collect the application form from the Primary Cooperative Agriculture and Rural Development Bank
Fill in the application and attach documents
Submit to the Secretary or Special Officer
Request receipt or acknowledgment with application details

documents_required: Proof of land ownership or lease

agriculture_and_farming_schemes.scheme_name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi Yojana
agriculture_and_farming_schemes.ministry: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
agriculture_and_farming_schemes.department: Department of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
objectives: Provide income support to small and marginal farmers
Enhance financial stability for farming households
eligibility_criteria: Farmer owning up to 2 hectares of cultivable land

steps: Register through PM-KISAN portal or at CSC

agriculture_and_farming_schemes.ministry: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
agriculture_and_farming_schemes.department: Department of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
objectives: Provide insurance coverage for crop losses

benefits.insurance_coverage: Premium as low as 1.5-5% of sum insured
benefits.compensation: For crop loss due to natural calamities

steps: Apply through banks, CSCs, or insurance companies

agriculture_and_farming_schemes.ministry: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
agriculture_and_farming_schemes.department: Department of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
objectives: Promote soil health through testing and management

steps: Submit soil samples to local agricultural office

agriculture_and_farming_schemes.ministry: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
agriculture_and_farming_schemes.department: Department of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
objectives: Create a unified national market for agricultural produce
Ensure better price discovery for farmers

benefits.market_access: Online trading platform for agricultural produce

eligibility_criteria: Farmer or trader registered on e-NAM

agriculture_and_farming_schemes.ministry: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
agriculture_and_farming_schemes.department: Department of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare

benefits.credit_limit: Up to ₹3 lakh at concessional rates

eligibility_criteria: Farmer engaged in agriculture or allied activities

steps: Apply through banks or cooperative societies

eligibility_criteria: Farmer or group of farmers practicing organic farming

benefits.subsidy: Up to 55% for small farmers, 45% for others

eligibility_criteria: Individual or group engaged in dairy farming

agriculture_and_farming_schemes.department: Department of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare

benefits.subsidy: On bamboo planting and processing units

agriculture_and_farming_schemes.department: Department of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare

agriculture_and_farming_schemes.scheme_name: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana - Watershed Development
agriculture_and_farming_schemes.ministry: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
agriculture_and_farming_schemes.department: Department of Land Resources

steps: Apply through state land resources department

agriculture_and_farming_schemes.ministry: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
agriculture_and_farming_schemes.department: Department of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare

agriculture_and_farming_schemes.ministry: Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry & Dairying

steps: Apply through insurance providers or banks

agriculture_and_farming_schemes.ministry: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
agriculture_and_farming_schemes.department: Department of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare

benefits.funding: Up to ₹20 lakh for individuals, ₹100 lakh for groups

agriculture_and_farming_schemes.ministry: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
agriculture_and_farming_schemes.department: Department of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
objectives: Promote beekeeping for pollination and income

rural_development_schemes.scheme_name: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA)
objectives: Provide at least 100 days of wage employment per rural household
Ensure social protection and strengthen local institutions

benefits.wage_employment: 100 days of guaranteed unskilled manual work

eligibility_criteria: Adult member volunteers to do unskilled manual labor

application_process.mode: Offline/Citizen Application through Gram Panchayat or Help Centre
steps: Apply for job card at Gram Panchayat
List of works available in panchayat

objectives: Provide pucca houses to houseless and kutcha-house dwellers
Ensure basic amenities in rural housing
eligibility_criteria: Rural houseless household and Kutcha house dwellers

steps: Construction and fund releases in installments

objectives: Provide all-weather road connectivity to unconnected habitations

benefits.rural_roads: Construction and upgradation of rural roads

eligibility_criteria: Habitations rural with population criterion (>500 plain, >250 hilly/tribal)

steps: Selection of habitations based on census data

rural_development_schemes.scheme_name: Deen Dayal Antyodaya – National Rural Livelihood Mission (DAY-NRLM)
objectives: Create self-managed institutional structures of rural poor
eligibility_criteria: Poor rural households identified via SECC or local process
Preference to women, SC/ST, vulnerable groups

steps: Link to banks for credit and enterprise support

rural_development_schemes.scheme_name: Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Yojana (DDU-GKY)
objectives: Skill rural youth (15–35 years) and place them in jobs
Diversify rural family income and support poor youth
eligibility_criteria: Rural youth aged 15–35 from poor families
Preferably BPL or identified via SECC

application_process.mode: Via training centers empaneled under RDAs
steps: Placed in jobs via placement partners

objectives: Provide financial assistance to vulnerable rural populations

steps: Validate and sanction by state government

rural_development_schemes.scheme_name: Old Age Pension Scheme under Chief Minister’s Uzhavar Padhukappu Thittam
rural_development_schemes.department: Social Welfare and Women Empowerment Department
objectives: Provide monthly pension and welfare support to elderly farmers and agricultural laborers

benefits.free_clothes: Dhoti (men) / Saree (women) during Pongal and Deepavali

eligibility_criteria: Destitute farmer or landless agricultural laborer
documents_required: Any identity proof (Voter ID, PAN, etc.)

rural_development_schemes.scheme_name: Afforestation Schemes Providing Incentives And Employment To Tribals In Forest
rural_development_schemes.parent_scheme: Tribal Forest Employment and Incentive Scheme
rural_development_schemes.department: Adi Dravidar and Tribal Welfare Department
objectives: Provide livelihood opportunities to unemployed tribals
Encourage tribal participation in afforestation and forest operations

benefits.incentive: Financial grants for participating in afforestation
benefits.employment: Employment opportunities in forest conservation activities

eligibility_criteria: Must belong to a tribal community

steps: Collect application form from the office of the District Forest Officer (DFO)
Fill in the form with required details and attach documents
Submit the form to DFO office
Request receipt or acknowledgment with application ID (if applicable)

documents_required: Proof of identity (Aadhaar card or similar)
Proof of residence in tribal/forest area

rural_development_schemes.scheme_name: District Central Cooperative Banks and through its Branches: For SSI Unit Loan and Other NFS Activities
rural_development_schemes.department: Co-operation, Food and Consumer Protection Department
objectives: Provide financial assistance to promote small-scale industries
Encourage growth of non-farm sector activities
eligibility_criteria: Loan purpose should be for SSI Unit or other Non-Farm Sector activities

steps: Collect application form from District Central Cooperative Banks or branches
Fill and submit the form along with required documents

documents_required: Business Plan or Project Report (if applicable)

rural_development_schemes.department: Department of Drinking Water and Sanitation
Department of Drinking Water and Sanitation
objectives: Provide safe drinking water to rural households
Develop rural clusters with urban amenities
Promote economic growth in rural areas

rural_development_schemes.department: Department of Social Justice and Empowerment

objectives: Develop model villages through MP adoption

objectives: Ensure safe drinking water in rural areas
